2.text: Fold the paper vertically in half.
2.vid: /4/44/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Fold each side of the paper to the center crease.
3.vid: /e/e3/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Fold the entire paper in half lengthwise.
4.vid: /7/7c/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Fold each short side to the center crease.
5.vid: /b/ba/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.vid: /0/06/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Fold the flaps from the middle down over the triangles made in the previous step.
7.vid: /b/b2/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

8.text: Pull up on the two flaps.
8.vid: /4/49/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.vid: /d/d3/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

11.text: Fold the paper lengthwise in half.
11.vid: /c/cd/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Fold the long sides to the center crease.
12.vid: /e/e9/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Fold back the edges lengthwise along the nearest crease.
13.vid: /8/8e/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.text: Flip the paper over and fold the edges to the center crease.
14.vid: /f/fd/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Fold the bottom left corner to the third crease towards the right.
15.vid: /4/4e/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 15 Version 3.360p.mp4

16.text: Fold the bottom right corner of the flap to the top edge.
16.vid: /d/dc/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4

17.text: Fold the bottom right corner upwards to meet the edge of the flap.
17.vid: /0/02/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 17 Version 3.360p.mp4

18.text: Insert the newly made section into the flap below.
18.vid: /1/1c/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 18 Version 3.360p.mp4

19.vid: /7/70/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 19 Version 3.360p.mp4

20.text: Repeat Steps 6-10 with the opposite end.
20.vid: /c/cc/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 20 Version 3.360p.mp4

21.vid: /0/08/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 21 Version 3.360p.mp4

23.text: Fold the paper in half diagonally, then unfold.
23.vid: /5/50/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 23 Version 2.360p.mp4

24.text: Fold each corner into the center.
24.vid: /2/2b/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 24 Version 3.360p.mp4

25.text: Fold two parallel edges to the center.
25.vid: /9/93/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 25 Version 3.360p.mp4

26.text: Fold the shorter edges to the center.
26.vid: /b/b7/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 26 Version 3.360p.mp4

27.vid: /4/4c/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 27 Version 2.360p.mp4

28.text: Lift the paper by either of the central widthwise triangles.
28.vid: /c/c9/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 28 Version 3.360p.mp4

29.text: Push the two creased triangles back inward.
29.vid: /0/0f/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 29 Version 3.360p.mp4

30.text: Fold the remaining triangle into the box.
30.vid: /5/5a/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 30 Version 3.360p.mp4

31.text: Repeat Steps 7 through 9 with the opposite side.
31.vid: /f/f2/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 31 Version 3.360p.mp4

33.text: Print off a pillow box template.

34.vid: /6/68/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 34 Version 2.360p.mp4

35.vid: /a/a2/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 35 Version 2.360p.mp4

36.text: Fold your box in half along the center fold line.
36.vid: /b/b6/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 36 Version 2.360p.mp4

37.vid: /3/3d/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 37 Version 2.360p.mp4

38.text: Assemble the main part of the box.

39.text: Fold the curved edges inward to finish your box.
39.vid: /4/4d/Make an Easy Paper Box Step 39 Version 2.360p.mp4
